question:
Consider the following schemes:
1. National Mission for Protein Supplements
2. Rainfed Area Development Programme
3. Accelerated Fodder Development Programme
Which of the above are sub schemes under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)?
explanation: All the above schemes are launched as sub schemes under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY).
